title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 328.5 - Ordinary death benefit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 328.5 - Ordinary death benefit

State Regulations

An employee member whose leave of absence without pay has
been approved pursuant to subparagraphs (d) will be covered by the ordinary
death benefit, in accordance with the provisions of sections
60
(a)(2)
and
360
(a)(2)
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. An employee member whose leave of absence without pay has been approved
pursuant to subparagraphs (b) will not be covered by the ordinary death benefit
during the period of such leave. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
328.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
